issue.body:
## Related Issues

## Deliverables

- [x] Update JavaDoc for `TempDirectory` and `@TempDir` regarding constructor parameters.
- [x] Update documentation for `TempDirectory` and `@TempDir` regarding constructor parameters in the User Guide.

issue.title: MockWebServer extension is starting new server when I call @BeforeEach and @AfterEach

repository.name: okhttp
repository.description: Square’s meticulous HTTP client for the JVM, Android, and GraalVM.

issue.title: Fix lifecycle for Junit 5 extension.

repository.name: okhttp
repository.description: Square’s meticulous HTTP client for the JVM, Android, and GraalVM.

issue.body:
#fixes https://github.com/square/okhttp/issues/7146

Takes a more opinionated view on lifecycle, namely.

- removing support for constructor injection (see https://github.com/junit-team/junit5/issues/1746)
- not supporting BeforeAll, AfterAll
- requiring a MockWebServerInstance annotation for distinct instances
